entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 29.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 29. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
